lines.text:
[as the henchman puts a gun to his head]
If I were you, I'd shoot.
If I were you, I'd still shoot!
What's gonna happen when they find that corpse at the cemetery?

[Showing the eyedrops]
All the better to see you with.
Ah, the Big Bad Wolf? What did you do with my granny?
I sent her to buy some eyedrops!
Ah, ha ha ha! Very funny!
